text: Richard Hudson Bryan (born July 16, 1937) is an American attorney and politician. He served as the 25th Governor of the U.S. state of Nevada from 1983-89, and as a United States Senator from Nevada from 1989 to 2001. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Bryan was born in Washington, D.C. and graduated from the University of Nevada at Reno in 1959 where he was a member of Alpha Tau Omega. He earned his law degree from the University of California, Hastings College of Law. In 1963 he was admitted to the Nevada Bar. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Nevada Category:United States senators from Nevada Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Richard Bryan
